document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined.
182 specimens ( ZIN , SIZK , KUMN , ZMUM , IMC ) from 16 provinces were studied.
Crimea
:
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Bilohirsk Distr. , Bila Skelya, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
17.v.1983
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Tarkhankut Peninsula ,
3.vi.1956
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Armyansk , S. V . Volovnik leg.,
12.v.1983
;
1 spec. ( SIZK )
12 km S Dzhankoy
, S. V . Volovnik leg., bank of Severokrymsky channel,
12.v.1982
;
1 spec. ( ZMUM ) Stary Krym near Feodosia ,
10.vi.1904
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Kerch , Jacentkowskij leg.,
25.v.1902
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Simferopol , A. Bazhenov leg.,
17.v.1899
;
1 spec. ( IMC ) Sudak Distr. , Grushivka , near stream,
1.vi.1952
;
1 spec. ( ZISK ) Yedi Quyu Distr. , Kazantip Cape , S. V . Volovnik leg.,
22.v.1983
;
11 spec. ( SIZK ) Dzhankoy Distr. , Tselinne , coast of Sivash, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
14.v.1983
;
Mykolaiv Prov.
: 1 spec. ( ZMUN ) Pervomaysk Distr. , Kuripchino , valley of Pivdennyi Buh River, P.N. Sheshurak. ,
21.v.2010
;
3 spec. ( SIZK ) Ochakiv Distr. , Porutyno , excavations of ancient Olvia, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
24.v.1982
;
3 spec. ( SIZK ) Berezan Distr. , Koblevo env., coast of Tiligulsky Lyman ,
15.vi.1980
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Nova Odesa Distr. , Mykhaylivka , plateau near quarry,
30.v.1966
;
Zaporizhia Prov .
: 1spec. ( IKC ) Melitopol Distr. , Orlove , N47.070833° , E35.593889° , Didova gull, I. V . Kovalev leg.,
4.vii.2009
;
1 spec. ( IKC ) Yakymivka Distr. , Altagirvill. , N46.627778° , E35.282222° , I. V . Kovalev leg.,
12.v.2011
.

Biology. Primary and secondary grasslands, forest and ruderal habitats. Adults occur in III–IX. Oligophagous on
Carduus
,
Cirsium
,
Centaurea
,
Jurinea
and others Asteraceae ( Ter-Minasian 1936 ; Isayev & Zotov 2003; Batra et al . 1971; Krivets 2007 ).
